Posts.Content: I don't think so. I have had four removed. Many suspect but thankfully all benign. First one I was 22 years old. My mom had breast cancer. I get checked every year. You will be okay. Just stay healthy, eat healthy, minimize caffeine and alcohol. Take care - TN
Posts.Title: Is it true fibroadenomas increase your breast caner risk?

Posts.Content:
I had four as I said before. All benign. But I have insisted they get removed. Not a big deal to have them taken out and you have the peace of mind knowing they are gone and can't turn into something. Take care!
C4-7 ACDF on June 2014:Large plate, 8 screws: done for spurring all levels, vertebrate collapsed and pushing on spinal cord.
Severe osteoporosis, DDD and osteoarthritis - all levels of spine
Failed L5/S1 LD surgery, spondylitheisis, stenosis, etc.
Migraines, cervicogenic headaches,hysterectomy, melanoma
Health nut, fit, active my whole life in spite of: tailgater did me in...
Posts.Title: please help me I am scared to death!!! i dont know what to do!
